00034 #ifdef DBG
00035 
00036 #define DBG_PRINT(...)                                    \
00037         do {                                              \
00038                 printf("%s(): %d: ", __func__, __LINE__); \
00039                 printf(__VA_ARGS__);                      \
00040         } while (0);
00041 #define DBG_SHOWFC() printf("%s(): %d: \n", __func__, __LINE__);
00042 
00043 #else
00044 
00045 #define DBG_PRINT(...) 
00046 #define DBG_SHOWFC()
00047 
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #define PRINT_ERROR(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__);
00051 
00052 #define ABORT(cond,message) \
00053         if(cond) { fprintf(stderr, "Abort from function %s : %s\n",__func__,message); \
00054         exit(1); }
00055 
00056 #define IS_ROOT(path) \
00057         ((strcmp(path, REAL_DIR) == 0 || (strncmp(path, REAL_DIR, strlen(REAL_DIR) -1) == 0 \
00058                 && strlen(path) == strlen(REAL_DIR) -1)) ? 1 : 0)
